name: TURKISH TEA
short_description: A traditional brew of carefully selected black tea leaves, steeped to achieve a deep amber colour and full-bodied flavour, served in the authentic Turkish style.

name: ENGLISH TEA
short_description: A timeless infusion of fine black tea leaves, carefully brewed to offer a clean, robust flavour with a refined and comforting character.

name: CAPPUCCINO
short_description: A classic Italian coffee crafted with freshly brewed espresso and perfectly textured steamed milk, finished with a light, velvety foam for a smooth and balanced flavour.

name: KARAK CHAI
short_description: A rich and aromatic tea slow-brewed with black tea leaves, milk and warming spices, delivering a bold, creamy texture with a comforting, indulgent finish.

name: CRYSTAL BLUE
short_description: A vibrant, citrus-forward blend with delicate sweetness, served chilled for a refreshing, crisp finish and striking visual appeal.

name: TROPI COLADA
short_description: A smooth, tropical blend of ripe pineapple and creamy coconut, delicately balanced and served chilled for a rich yet refreshing finish.

name: RUBY MINT
short_description: Fresh strawberries blended with cooling mint and subtle sweetness, served chilled for a refreshing balance of bright fruit and herbal freshness.

name: MELON TWIST
short_description: A refreshing blend of ripe melon and fresh citrus, lightly sweetened and served chilled, offering a smooth, cooling finish with delicate fruity notes.

name: LEMONADE (ALCOHOL FREE)
short_description: A refreshing blend of freshly squeezed lemons, lightly sweetened and perfectly chilled, delivering a crisp, clean balance of citrus brightness and subtle sweetness.

name: MARGARITA  (ALCOHOL FREE)
short_description: A refined blend of premium tequila, fresh lime juice and orange liqueur, perfectly balanced and served chilled with a clean, citrus-led finish.

name: KÜNEFE
short_description: A warm Middle Eastern delicacy of crisp, golden shredded pastry layered with soft, molten cheese, gently baked and finished with fragrant sugar syrup for a perfectly balanced sweetness.

name: Baklava
short_description: Delicate layers of crisp filo pastry filled with finely ground nuts, baked until golden and finished with light aromatic syrup, offering a refined harmony of texture and sweetness.

name: Baked Meat
short_description: Tender cuts of meat slowly baked with subtle seasoning and aromatics, allowing natural flavours to deepen and develop into a rich, comforting and satisfying dish.

name: Chapli Kebab
short_description: A traditional spiced kebab made from finely minced meat blended with herbs and spices, shallow-fried until crisp on the outside while remaining succulent and flavourful within.

name: Ranjha gosht
short_description: A rich and aromatic lamb curry, slow-cooked with tomatoes, onions and warming spices, creating deep layers of flavour with a beautifully balanced, velvety finish.

name: Bannu Pulao
short_description: Fragrant basmati rice gently cooked with tender meat and whole spices, delivering delicate aromas, soft textures and a refined, comforting richness in every spoonful.

name: Lamb Ribs
short_description: Succulent lamb ribs slow-cooked until tender, finished with a gentle glaze and aromatic seasoning for a deeply flavourful and indulgent experience.

name: Prawns Tikka
short_description: Juicy prawns marinated in yoghurt, citrus and spices, grilled to perfection for a smoky finish with vibrant, balanced flavours.

name: Chicken Kebab Barg
short_description: Tender pieces of chicken breast marinated in aromatic herbs, garlic and olive oil, grilled slowly to preserve juiciness while developing gentle charred notes, resulting in a beautifully balanced, flavourful kebab.

name: Lamb Kebab Barg
short_description: Succulent cubes of premium lamb, delicately marinated in olive oil, garlic and subtle spices, then grilled over open flames to achieve a tender interior and a lightly charred exterior, offering rich, smoky depth with every bite.

name: Lamb Chops
short_description: Premium lamb chops delicately seasoned and grilled, offering a tender, juicy texture with refined smoky notes and a clean, elegant finish.

name: Chicken Wings
short_description: Marinated chicken wings grilled slowly over open flames, allowing the skin to crisp while the meat remains succulent, finished with gentle seasoning for a bold yet refined smoky flavour.

name: Chicken Adana Kebab
short_description: Minced chicken blended with red pepper, garlic and traditional spices, shaped by hand and grilled over charcoal, delivering a juicy, gently spiced kebab with a distinctive smoky aroma.

name: Lamb Adana Kebab
short_description: Finely minced lamb combined with red peppers and aromatic spices, hand-pressed onto skewers and grilled over charcoal, offering intense flavour, tenderness and a beautifully spiced finish.

name: Chicken Shish Kebab
short_description: Classic skewered chicken marinated in citrus, garlic and herbs, expertly grilled to deliver a soft, juicy texture with a light smoky finish, celebrating simplicity and clean, well-defined flavours.

name: Lamb Shish Kebab
short_description: Hand-cut lamb pieces marinated in fragrant spices and olive oil, grilled to perfection to enhance natural richness, offering a tender bite with subtle smokiness and aromatic warmth.

name: Chicken hummus
short_description: Velvety hummus made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon and garlic, crowned with tender chicken gently marinated and sautéed with warming spices, then finished with olive oil for a refined harmony of creamy depth and savoury richness.

name: Creamy mushroom soup
short_description: A luxurious velouté made from carefully selected mushrooms gently sautéed with onion and garlic, slow-simmered and blended with cream to create a silky texture and deep, earthy richness.

name: Lamb Avocado Hummus
short_description: An indulgent pairing of smooth avocado hummus crafted with chickpeas, tahini, lemon and garlic, finished with tender, slow-cooked lamb seasoned with aromatic spices, delivering bold depth with a luxuriously creamy finish.

name: Kibbeh
short_description: A traditional delicacy of finely ground meat and bulgur wheat, filled with seasoned mince and gently fried or baked, offering a crisp exterior and a richly spiced, tender centre.

name: Chicken Soup
short_description: A comforting yet refined soup prepared from tender chicken gently simmered with aromatic vegetables and herbs, creating a clear, flavourful broth that is both nourishing and elegantly balanced.

name: Lentil Soup
short_description: A traditional, slow-cooked soup of red lentils simmered with onion, garlic and gentle spices, blended to a smooth consistency and finished with olive oil for warmth, depth and comfort.

name: Tabbouleh
short_description: A vibrant Levantine salad of finely chopped parsley, fresh mint, tomatoes and bulgur, dressed with lemon juice and olive oil, offering bright freshness, delicate texture and lively citrus notes.

name: Yogurt and cucumber salad
short_description: Cool, creamy yoghurt blended with fresh cucumber, garlic and herbs, lightly seasoned to create a refreshing and perfectly balanced accompaniment to grilled dishes.

add_to_cart.description: Add to cart: “Yogurt and cucumber salad”

name: Fattoush
short_description: A crisp, refreshing salad of seasonal vegetables tossed with toasted flatbread, sumac and a zesty lemon dressing, delivering bold contrasts of crunch, tang and herbal depth.

name: Lahmacun
short_description: A thin, crisp flatbread topped with finely minced meat, tomatoes, herbs and aromatic spices, baked until lightly crisp and fragrant, offering a delicate balance of spice and texture.

name: Chicken Wings
short_description: Marinated chicken wings grilled slowly over open flames, allowing the skin to crisp while the meat remains succulent, finished with gentle seasoning for a bold yet refined smoky flavour.

name: Chicken Avocado Hummus
short_description: Creamy avocado-infused hummus prepared from chickpeas, tahini, lemon and garlic, elegantly topped with succulent, spiced chicken, creating a refined balance of freshness, richness and savoury warmth.

name: Plain Avocado Hummus
short_description: A contemporary expression of hummus, where chickpeas are finely blended with ripe avocado, tahini, lemon and garlic, resulting in a buttery, vibrant purée finished with extra virgin olive oil for a fresh, elegant taste.

name: Plain Hummus
short_description: A silken purée of slow-blended chickpeas, tahini, fresh lemon and garlic, finished with extra virgin olive oil and a touch of sea salt, crafted to achieve an exceptionally smooth texture and perfectly balanced, timeless flavour.

name: Lamb Hummus
short_description: A luxurious composition of silky chickpea hummus blended with tahini, lemon and garlic, topped with slow-cooked lamb delicately infused with cumin and coriander, offering rich, aromatic layers and a deeply satisfying finish.

name: Falafel
short_description: Golden-fried chickpea fritters blended with herbs, garlic and spices, crisp on the outside and soft within, delivering comforting warmth and deep, savoury flavour.
